name: Alchemist's Supplies
description: Alchemist's supplies enable a character to produce useful concoctions, such as acid or alchemist's fire.

activities.name: Create a puff of thick smoke

name: Brewer's Supplies
description: Brewing is the art of producing beer. Not only does beer serve as an alcoholic beverage, but the process of brewing purifies water. Crafting beer takes weeks of fermentation, but only a few hours of work.

activities.name: Detect poison or impurities in a drink

name: Calligrapher's Tools
description: Calligraphy treats writing as a delicate, beautiful art. Calligraphers produce text that is pleasing to the eye, using a style that is difficult to forge. Their supplies also give them some ability to examine scripts and determine if they are legitimate, since a calligrapher's training involves long hours of studying writing and attempting to replicate its style and design.

name: Carpenter's Tools
description: Skill at carpentry enables a character to construct wooden structures. A carpenter can build a house, a shack, a wooden cabinet, or similar items.

activities.name: Find a weak point in a wooden wall

name: Cartographer's Tools
description: Using cartographer's tools, you can create accurate maps to make travel easier for yourself and those who come after you. These maps can range from large-scale depictions of mountain ranges to diagrams that show the layout of a dungeon level.

activities.name: Determine a map's age and origin
Estimate direction and distance to a landmark
Discern that a map is a fake
Fill in a missing part of a map

name: Cobbler's Tools
description: Although the cobbler's trade might seem too humble for an adventurer, a good pair of boots will see a character across rugged wilderness and through deadly dungeons.

activities.name: Determine a shoe's age and origin
Find a hidden compartment in a boot heel

name: Cook's Utensils
description: Adventuring is a hard life. With a cook along on the journey, your meals will be much better than the typical mix of hardtack and dried fruit.

activities.name: Spot poison or iompurities in good

name: Glassblower's Tools
description: Someone who is proficient with glassblower's tools has not only the ability to shape glass, but also specialized knowledge of the methods used to produce glass objects.

activities.name: Determine what a glass object once held

name: Jeweler's Tools
description: Training with jeweler's tools includes the basic techniques needed to beautify gems. It also gives you expertise in identifying precious stones.

name: Leatherworker's Tools
description: Knowledge of leatherworking extends to lore concerning animal hides and their properties. It also confers knowledge of Leather Armor and similar goods.

name: Mason's Tools
description: Mason's tools allow you to craft stone structures, including walls and buildings crafted from brick.

activities.name: Chisel a small hole in a stone wall
Find a weak point in a stone wall

name: Painter's Supplies
description: Proficiency with painter's supplies represents your ability to paint and draw. You also acquire an understanding of art history, which can aid you in examining works of art.

activities.name: Create a painting with a hidden message

name: Potter's Tools
description: Potter's tools are used to create a variety of ceramic objects, most typically pots and similar vessels.

activities.name: Determine what a vessel once held
Find a weak point in a ceramic object

name: Smith's Tools
description: Smith's tools allow you to work metal, beating it to alter its shape, repair damage, or work raw ingots into useful items.

name: Tinker's Tools
description: A set of tinker's tools is designed to enable you to repair many mundane objects. Though you can't manufacture much with tinker's tools, you can mend torn clothes, sharpen a worn sword, and patch a tattered suit of chain mail.

activities.name: Repair an item in half the time
Improvise a temporary item using scraps

name: Weaver's Tools
description: Weaver's tools allow you to create cloth and tailor it into articles of clothing.

activities.name: Mend a hole in a piece of cloth

name: Woodcarver's Tools
description: Woodcarver's tools allow you to craft intricate objects from wood, such as wooden tokens or arrows.

activities.name: Carve an intricate pattern in wood

name: Forgery Kit
description: A forgery kit is designed to duplicate documents and to make it easier to copy a person's seal or signature.

name: Herbalism Kit
description: Proficiency with an herbalism kit allows you to identify plants and safely collect their useful elements.

name: Navigator's Tools
description: Proficiency with navigator's tools helps you determine a true course based on observing the stars. It also grants you insight into charts and maps while developing your sense of direction.

activities.name: Discover your position on a nautical chart

name: Poisoner's Kit
description: A poisoner's kit is a favored resource for thieves, assassins, and others who engage in skulduggery. It allows you to apply poisons and create them from various materials. Your knowledge of poisons also helps you treat them.

activities.name: Determine the effects of a poison

name: Thieves' Tools
description: Perhaps the most common tools used by adventurers, thieves' tools are designed for picking locks and foiling traps. Proficiency with the tools also grants you a general knowledge of traps and locks.
